mapper.insert: insert into tag(id, name, color, creator_id, create_time, update_time) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{color}, #{creatorId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select:
select t.*, creator.name as creatorName from tag t join user as creator on creator.id = t.creator_id
and t.name like concat('%',#{name}, '%')
select t.* from tag t where t.id in (select tag_id from blog_tag where blog_id = #{blogId})
